Title: Devadas
Writer: Sriram Adittya, Venkat D. Pati, Bhupati Raja, Satyanand
Actors: Nagarjuna Akkineni, Nani, Aakanksha Singh, Rashmika Mandanna
Plot: Devadas is a Telugu movie starring Nagarjuna Akkineni, Nani and Rashmika Mandanna in prominent roles. It is a drama written and directed by Sriram Adittya, forming part of the crew.
